data.comment: The match is underway in Gelsenkirchen.
The match is underway in Gelsenkirchen.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at VELTINS-Arena.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Guido Burgstaller (Schalke) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Weston McKennie gets his shot on target but fails to score for Schalke.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Sven Jablonski awards Schalke a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski signals a Schalke throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Throw-in Schalke.
Schalke push forward at VELTINS-Arena and Benito Raman gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hoffenheim defence.
Schalke's Benito Raman gets in a shot on goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Schalke.
In Gelsenkirchen Schalke drive forward through Jonjoe Kenny. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bastian Oczipka (Schalke) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.

Weston McKennie puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jonjoe Kenny to set up the goal.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Can Hoffenheim capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.

Schalke's Benito Raman breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.

Christoph Baumgartner is replacing Havard Nordtveit for the away team.
In Gelsenkirchen, Rabbi Matondo of Schalke is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Gelsenkirchen Schalke attack through Rabbi Matondo. The finish is off target, however.
